p: The lymphocytopenia appeared to be associated with the virus infection. The CRP level remained the same (2.72 mg/dL) the day after admission, and it was not followed up further because the symptoms improved in the patient. The AST, ALT, and Î³-GTP levels showed a decreasing trend (33 IU/L, 67 IU/L, and 124 IU/L, respectively) the next day, and an ultrasound scan of the abdomen revealed a fatty liver.
